name: Don't Die (itch) (ShadowBoi3000)
description:
A game made for 101 Game Jam, where we had to make a game in 4 days. I decided to make this game with my good friend Pranav (https://kpranav21.itch.io/).

The main theme is BREAK THE RULES
The secondary theme is HARDER, BETTER, FASTER, STRONGER
The tertiary theme is AN UNCONVENTIONAL WEAPON

The game has one rule, that is to not die. And the only way to win that game is to break the rule (i.e.  to die)

You have a 'Health Bot' to keep you alive, which is your 'Unconventional weapon'

With every level your 'Unconventional Weapon' becomes harder, better faster stronger!

CONTROLS:

MOVING: A / D / LEFT ARROW / RIGHT ARROW

JUMP: SPACE

This is our first game, and our first Game Jam.
Hope you have fun playing this game!

Game music from zapsplat.com
All game assets made by us.
